This sophisticated hotel is 5 km from Van Vihar National Park, 2 km from the Madhya Pradesh Tribal Museum and a mile from the State Museum Bhopal.Understated rooms and suites offer free Wi-Fi, satellite TV and minibars, as well as sitting areas, and tea and coffeemaking facilities. Some have terraces.Room service is available 24/7.\nBreakfast is complimentary.Dining options consist of 3 restaurants, a cafe and 2 bars. Other amenities include an outdoor pool, a gym and a hot tub, plus a garden, and meeting and event space. There is also a spa, a sauna and a steam room. courtyard by marriott bhopal-Featuring a spacious landscape pool, Courtyard Bhopal offers elegantly furnished rooms with floor-to-ceiling glass windows. It also has 1 restaurants and 1 bars with 24-hour in-room dining.Located 4.3 mi away from Bhopal Railway Station, the property is also 11 mi away from the historical Jamma Mosque and 11 mi from Rajah Bhoj International Airport. Airport Shuttle Services are available at a surcharge.Air-conditioned rooms are fitted with ironing facilities, a flat-screen TV and a laptop size safe. Tea/coffee making facilities and a mini-bar are included. The spacious attached bathroom comes with shower facilities and toiletries. Take a refreshing dip in the azure swimming pool.Start your day with a refreshing workout session at the on-site gym.Enjoy a wide range of fun-filled games at the on-site games zone.Relish lip-smacking Indian, Chinese an European delicacies at the on-site restaurant, Sanchi. Make your leisurely trip comfortable by staying at this hotel with furnished rooms, a swimming pool, restaurant and Wi-Fi.Guests can dine at the hotels restaurant and coffee shop. The on-site swimming pool and fitness centre make up for a relaxing stay experience.Tours and transfers are arranged by the in-house travel desk. your special events memorable by organising them at banquets or on-site lawn.A currency exchange facility is available for international guests.Savour exotic drinks at the bar.An in-house restaurant serves guests delectable Indian meals. Stay at this charming hotel in Bhopal, featuring stylish rooms, a restaurant, a banquet hall and an on-site water park.Relish lip-smacking food and refreshing drinks served at the in-house multi-cuisine restaurant. rajhans_about shubhinn_about

kuchina_about An excellent restaurant with staff who cater to your personal requirements. We stayed at the hotel for over a week and were happy to be obliged with dishes made to our requirements and taste. Chef Ravi Patel did an excellent job of preparing our mix veg without gravy and fresh as per taste . Also the ever smiling faces of Ajay and Suraj serving us and welcoming us for meals three times a day is noteworthy considering the long hours they put in . They blocked our table for the stay , kept minor details like iced drinking water and papads ready as soon as we sat down. You must ask for Chicken Tangdi kebab and Mutton Galouti kebab prepared by Chef Ravi and is a must have mango_tree_about crystal_dew_about wind_wave_about dakshin_resto_about

Phone number not found. Website not found. Unable to locate on the maps. Savour an affordable yet ravishing stay with your friends and family at Rajhans Regency and savour the early morning breakfast delivered to you in your room itself.
An affordable yet ravishing stay in Bhopal, near the Birla Museum and the International airport. The property is surrounded by security guards and is under CCTV surveillance 24/7. The guests can avail of private as well as contactless check-in/check-out facilities at the property. About \u2022
